item.title: Manatee add a quote by Edward P. Jones
item.description: "(Her husband's departure ...)had picked Mildred up by the hair and dropped her down at the doorstep of insanity. From "Butterfly on F street" -- Edward P. Jones

item.title: Manatee add a quote by Aleksandr I. Solzhenitsyn
item.description: "If only it were all so simple! If only there were evil people somewhere insidiously committing evil deeds, and it were necessary only to separate them from the rest of us and destroy them. But the line dividing good and evil cuts through the heart of every human being. And who is willing to destroy a piece of his own heart?" -- Aleksandr I. Solzhenitsyn

item.title: Manatee add a quote by Leonard Cohen
item.description: "Así como un ave en su jaula. Así como un bebedor entre el bullicio de la medianoche, así he intentado ser libre, a mi manera." -- Leonard Cohen
